description:
With a wood handle that feels like an extension of your hand, the Eggen is a quality tool designed for years of use. This version of the Eggen features the 12C27 blade instead of Helle’s signature laminate steel. The 12C27 is a solid performer and is a bit more corrosion resistant than the laminate steel.

  • 12C27 stainless steel is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Scandinavian (Scandi) grind excels at bushcraft tasks
  • Handle is curly birch wood
  • Sculpted guard keeps fingers safe
  • Leather sheath places the knife right on the belt-line, keeping it close at hand
  • Since 1932, Helle knives have been made in Norway, passing from experienced craftsmen on its way to your belt
  • Variations in colour and patterns mean no two are alike
name: Helle Eggen 12C27 Knife
